column5: Decided to head fishing Sunday as the weather looked nice and really did not want too be stuck inside  or at another mall letting the kids run.  Tried to do some last minute hook up's but everyone had made plans. Oh well far be it from me to deter from fishing.  With no commitments or promises of perch I decided to give the elusive whitefish another try.  Got too my site at 6:45 then walked almost 1.5k out on the Simcoe, had a mild heart attach from pulling my pack then started fishing. Within the first 30 minutes I had already lost 1.  Humm this might be a good day, Brought my first whitefish up not more then 15 minutes later,. I had a few more major hits and hookups but I could not get anything to the surface,  Got another one around 10:30 but it was too small and back in the hole it went, then 11:45 was going to bring up my line reeled a few times and saw something on the finder come swimming in to check it out and bammm another one on this time with some weight too it,  Called it a day as soon as I got it in, WOW what a day. Best Day ICE FISHING YET,  MY whitefish SKUNK IS GONE!!!!

Big congrats, I know how long you've been hoping to get that monkey off your back.  I guess you can sell all the ice gear now and settle into contented retirement.  But if you decide to give it another go I'll make sure to keep the day free
Great report and pics LeXXington  Man you got a couple today.... Congratulations We tried our luck and got into only one..... but them lakers sure were active Thanks for sharing Leechman
Very Nice!!!!!    Good for You!!  Rick
A Hearty Congratulations to you on breaking the Whitie curse and of course your PB whitey Lexxy!!!  Great report and pics!!!
Very nice catch, congrats!   FYI.. the orange juice goes in the fridge
Well done brotha.  What kinda set up were you working if you don't mind?  MMMMMMM tasty fish!  cheers HD
A few dandy whities for sure bud !!!! glad the curse has been lifted for ya !!.  ..the fish gods were smilin today for you...cheers
some good looking whities you got there!!!
Some nice fish there, way to go!!!!  Maureen
Right on! And all on your own as well, impressive.
WTG Lex... nice catch...
Right on!  Let the games begin.  I bet you are just hooked.  I remember years ago when i got my first whitie!  Now its hard to get me off simcoe in the winter to explore other lakes
Congratulations, Paul, very nice whities.  Goodonya.
Looks like all that hard work paid off...congrats...nice fish!!  Cheers Jason
Congrats Paul and great shootin !!! I got my first ever Whitie this morning myself!
Flies open.  "Uh Oh, Hot Dog!"    Well done.  My first Simcoe whitie was a snag. Go figure.  You look completed.
Congrats Paul, great lookin' fish!  Hopefully I'll be able to get my first soon too. Maybe I'll just follow you at the Tyler Tourney.....
....That Somcoe "gold" sure has a nice silver sheen.    WTG Paul, now tell me how did they taste?
Ahhh sucess....feels good doesn't it.  congrats
The jug is empty....    Congrats on the whitie's ,, this weekend the amigo's are heading up to Simcoe for some whities are selves
That's awesome Lexx.  Way to go  Joey
Those there are some really nice whities...WTG
